text: The Cape Breton Post is the only daily newspaper published on Cape Breton Island. Based in Sydney, Nova Scotia, it specializes in local coverage of news, events, and sports from communities in the Cape Breton Regional Municipality and the counties of Inverness, Richmond and Victoria. On April 13, 2017, Transcontinental announced that it had sold all of its newspapers in Atlantic Canada to SaltWire Network, a newly formed parent company of The Chronicle Herald. ==See also== *List of newspapers in Canada ==References== ==External links== *Official website Category:Mass media in the Cape Breton Regional Municipality Category:SaltWire Network publications Category:Daily newspapers published in Nova Scotia Category:Publications with year of establishment missing
title: Cape Breton Post
